tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
***** ********* *** * *********** ******I needed to have a wisdom tooth surgically removed. But because of a nerve almost touching the tooth‚Äôs root - the risk of nerve damage was very high (other dentists I‚Äôd consulted had estimated the risk as high as 80%)
Having spent a good amount of time studying my reports/scans, Dr. Manju was confident that she had a way to do it without impacting the nerve, as she‚Äôd handled similar cases before. The procedure went hitch-free and there was great post-op support (she makes herself available personally on WhatsApp). I fully recovered within 1-2 months without any lingering problems whatsoever. Would strongly recommend her to anyone looking for a careful, experienced oral surgeon who is generous with her time for patients.

review:
We have been getting treatment from Dr. Soni Detal Clinic, Dr. Manju Kaushik, for almost 30 years. We are perfectly happy with the professional competence and services of Dr. Manju Kaushik. 
I have only one point to make. Sometimes, we have to wait for 30 minutes or even more. There used to be some magzines and newspapers for the patients and their attendants to keep themselves busy. But this has been stopped now. I would request that this be restarted.
